name: Cog
text: 0:0, build 1 (+1 to a robot in your hand, or make a 0:1 fleeting robot)

name: Fishing Boat
text:
2:0, tutor 1 3 times.

name: Angler

name: Desert
text:
4:0, modal:
0: +1, later cards this round are worth -2

1-2: Reset
3+: +4
